title: Manage a Large Concrete Pour
description: A supervisor is managing a large, continuous concrete pour for a building foundation and must track the trucks and volumes.

tasks.description: Check the daily schedule to see how many concrete trucks are expected.
tasks.expected_outcome: The schedule shows 20 trucks are planned for the day.

tasks.description: As each truck arrives, log its delivery ticket number and the volume of concrete it delivered.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor logs the arrival and volume for each truck.

tasks.description: Keep a running total of the volume poured and compare it to the total required for the foundation to ensure the pour is completed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent maintains a running total and confirms when the total required volume has been reached.
